title: Ugadi 2010
content:
Vikruti Nama Samvatsara Ugadi Subhakankshalu and Happy Gudi Padwa!



Ugadi Pachadi Recipe

Ugadi Festival Recipes


Ugadi Menu ~ Pesarapappu Thotakura Kadala Kootu, Gutti Dondakaya Vepudu, Carrot Masala Vada, Vankaya Mamidikaya Pachadi, Mamidikaya Mukkala Pachadi, Senaga Pappu Bellam Payasam 

For Ugadi recipes, I have complied a list of andhra recipes. Follow this link to get the telugu vantalu - Ugadi Recipes
